message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a great deal for both of us - you get a valuable product at a good price, and I get a quick sale. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but based on my budget, I am only able to offer $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $975000. This reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal.  Let's close this deal!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I am able to offer $960000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
